=== About Me ===

My name is FAREH Abdelhak from Algeria, 31 years old. I am assistant professor of Computer Science at Dr. Yahia Fares University of Medea, Algeria, and organizer of <nowiki>[[http://www.univ-medea.dz/sfddz2011|Software Freedom Day Algeria 2011]]</nowiki>. <<BR>> 
Member of <nowiki>[[AlgerianTeam|Ubuntu Algeria]]</nowiki> since March 26, 2010.
